title: How to Make Extra Cheesy Macaroni and Cheese

steps.headline: Get about 3 or 4 cups of water boiling on the stove in a pot.
When the water comes to a boil, add in the macaroni and cook for approximately 15 minutes.
steps.description: You only need to stir once, because the boiling water moves the macaroni around the pot

steps.headline: Place the strainer over a sink and pour the (very hot) macaroni and the water into it.
steps.description: Shake a few times to remove as much water as possible

steps.headline: Put the macaroni back in the pot and place the pot on a different part of the stove, or onto a towel on the counter/table
Take one tablespoon of the spreadable cheese and put it into a plastic bowl
Put the bowl in the microwave for approximately 10-15 seconds, until it starts  to bubble and liquefy.
Pour in one tablespoon of the milk and stir rapidly for a few seconds.
Add in the cheese pouch from the box of macaroni and mix into the macaroni in the pot.
steps.description: Add in the other tablespoon of milk and stir.

steps.headline: Add in the new melted cheese and milk sauce and stir
Enjoy your delicious bowl of mac n' cheese!

text: Get about 3 or 4 cups of water boiling on the stove in a pot.  When the water comes to a boil, add in the macaroni and cook for approximately 15 minutes. You only need to stir once, because the boiling water moves the macaroni around the pot Place the strainer over a sink and pour the (very hot) macaroni and the water into it. Shake a few times to remove as much water as possible Put the macaroni back in the pot and place the pot on a different part of the stove, or onto a towel on the counter/table  Take one tablespoon of the spreadable cheese and put it into a plastic bowl  Put the bowl in the microwave for approximately 10-15 seconds, until it starts  to bubble and liquefy.  Pour in one tablespoon of the milk and stir rapidly for a few seconds.  Add in the cheese pouch from the box of macaroni and mix into the macaroni in the pot. Add in the other tablespoon of milk and stir. Add in the new melted cheese and milk sauce and stir  Enjoy your delicious bowl of mac n' cheese!
